attributes.additional_details:
This will help promote exercise and good mental health in all participants, the majority of which are middle aged or elderly. 
By it’s nature, golf maintains government distancing measures and touch points are reduced by the normal wearing of golf gloves.
As this is played outdoors and will be during the summer months, transmission of the virus should be minimal.
attributes.background: Allow golf courses to reopen during the covid-19 lockdown.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that golf courses in England can re-open. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
